body: I agree, even though I can't stand straight NTR, yuri / futa NTR is extremely hot.

Yuri netorare...well, I can’t really do my usual shtick about that. It’s surpsingly hot. Maybe it’s the disconnect of not being a lesbian, but this is for more tolerable than normal NTR, plus the art is really good. Edit: the Miniaml display of actual “cuckolding” helps too, as with many NTR doujins that are barely even NTR outside of a couple panels and maybe some text bubbles.
My ass thought the thumbnail was the new female pokemon trainer
